modMetaData.name: Altered Carbon: Ultratech Unleashed 中文漢化包
modMetaData.author: 五等分の三葉
modMetaData.description:
This is just a language pack, you can jump to the original MOD through the required items on the right or manually search for the original MOD name [h1][b]Altered Carbon: Ultratech Unleashed的中文翻譯包。[/b][/h1]
此為1.4版本的個人翻譯，可能會有缺漏或是名詞差異 有問題或改善建議可在底下回覆，有看到將會更新 簡體翻譯將直接套用繁體
